transArray.content: Very satisfied. The room is very comfortable. The lady also upgraded the room type for free. The hotel is very quiet and the service staff are very friendly. It is a very comfortable travel experience~

Wow! The simple words of the little owner carry huge energy. Xiao Hanma has always been determined to provide considerate services to every little owner who comes to the store. Thank you for being recognized by you. We need your company and guidance on our growth path. , recently a self-service laundry room and a high-temperature sterilization dryer have been added to the store to make your journey safer and more convenient. We look forward to seeing you back home again!
